ValueSet-IMMZD18SHib3DosesVS.title: IMMZD18SHib3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
ValueSet-IMMZD18SHib3DosesVS.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD18SHib3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#First Hib dose from the primary series was administered-279
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#First Hib dose from the primary series was administered to the client within 1 year of age. Client's age is less than 5 years-302
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Second Hib dose from the primary series was administered-122
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Second Hib dose from the primary series was administered. Client's age is less than 5 years-167
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Third Hib dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-100
ValueSet-IMMZD18SHib3DosesVS.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD18SHib3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD18SHib3DosesVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
